Then I'll taste it... *lick*\""},{"lineNumber":43415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah!?\""},{"lineNumber":43416,"originalJapaneseLine":"精製した液体を、ちぬはいとも容易く、","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu easily scooped up the purified liquid,"},{"lineNumber":43417,"originalJapaneseLine":"指ですくって舐めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"licking it off her finger."},{"lineNumber":43418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー☆　ていすてぃ……いい感じー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm ☆ Tasty... pretty good—\""},{"lineNumber":43419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おい、大丈夫なのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, are you really okay?\""},{"lineNumber":43420,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっは。ナナサンダケは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha ha ha. The Nanasa mushroom,"},{"lineNumber":43421,"originalJapaneseLine":"　常人ならば素手で触れただけで死に至るはずだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"would normally kill an ordinary person just by touching it bare-handed.\""},{"lineNumber":43422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見たところ、あの鬼たちが常食し、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From what I see, those ogres regularly consume it,"},{"lineNumber":43423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体内に溜め込んだ毒の強さはそれ以上。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the poison accumulated in their bodies is even stronger."},{"lineNumber":43424,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それをあの扱いとは、なかなか面白い身体だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And yet Chinu handles it like that, quite an interesting body indeed.\""},{"lineNumber":43425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言ってる場合か、こら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this the time to talk?! Come on!"},{"lineNumber":43426,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちぬちゃん、ぺっしなさい、ぺっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu-chan, spit it out, spit!\""},{"lineNumber":43427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　平気だよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? I'm fine."},{"lineNumber":43428,"originalJapaneseLine":"　蘇ってから、なんだか毒も平気になっちゃった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Since I was revived, somehow I'm okay with poison now.\""},{"lineNumber":43429,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ゾンビっぽいからかな……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maybe it's because she’s like a zombie...)\""},{"lineNumber":43430,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ゾンビさんみたいだからでしょうか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Could it be that she’s like a zombie...)\""},{"lineNumber":43431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでも彼女は生きているのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so, she is still alive.\""},{"lineNumber":43432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イチコロ茶葉に、混ぜて、混ぜて……うん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mix it into the Ichikoro tea leaves, stir, stir... yeah."},{"lineNumber":43433,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスに戻る頃には、きっといい感じ☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time we return to Zeth, it should taste just right ☆\""},{"lineNumber":43434,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちぬは嬉しそうに、ティーポットに","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu happily dripped the poison into the teapot,"},{"lineNumber":43435,"originalJapaneseLine":"毒を垂らし入れ、よく混ぜて閉めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stirred it well, and closed the lid."},{"lineNumber":43436,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、ね、らんすたま。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, Rance-sama."},{"lineNumber":43437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　完成したよ、ご褒美欲しいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s finished! I want a reward."},{"lineNumber":43438,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゅーとか☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like a kiss ☆\""},{"lineNumber":43439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ、よせ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-bah, stop!"},{"lineNumber":43440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その口で今、キスしようとするんじゃない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't try to kiss me with that mouth right now!\""},{"lineNumber":43441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー。残念……☆」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh. Too bad... ☆\""},{"lineNumber":43442,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は毒を採取して、ゼスへの帰路に就いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others collected the poison and set off on the road back to Zeth."},{"lineNumber":43443,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニカニカ平原――","translatedEnglishLine":"Nikanika Plain—"},{"lineNumber":43444,"originalJapaneseLine":"――その、ゼス軍東方司令部。","translatedEnglishLine":"—At the Zeth Army Eastern Command."},{"lineNumber":43445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーす、戻った…………うお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo, we’re back... Whoa!\""},{"lineNumber":43446,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイアスとウスピラは椅子の背にもたれかかり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Saiaasu and Uspira were slumped back in their chairs,"},{"lineNumber":43447,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐったりとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"looking exhausted."},{"lineNumber":43448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………死んでる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Are they dead?\""},{"lineNumber":43449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ、ボーヤか…………戻った、か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it’s the boy... They’re back, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":43450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, huh...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、たぶん？」
「手ぶらで帰るよりはマシか。
よーし、毒鬼を狩り立てるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's hunt down the poison ogres!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んを？」
「くたばれ、盗み食い犯が！」
ランス達は、食休みに入ろうとしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were about to take a break after eating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼に襲い掛かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when they were attacked by the ogres.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーぅ……ちぬちゃん、どうだ？」
「んー、どうだろ。
血を採ってー、色々ぐるぐるしてー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Collected the blood, mixed it around a lot—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、こんな感じかなっ☆
ほら、ランスたま、あーん♪」
「要らんわ！」
「ちぇー。じゃあちぬが味見……ぺろっ」
精製した液体を、ちぬはいとも容易く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chinu easily scooped up the purified liquid,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指ですくって舐めた。
「んー☆　ていすてぃ……いい感じー」
「……おい、大丈夫なのか」
「はっはっは。ナナサンダケは、
常人ならば素手で触れただけで死に至るはずだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would normally kill an ordinary person just by touching it bare-handed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見たところ、あの鬼たちが常食し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From what I see, those ogres regularly consume it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体内に溜め込んだ毒の強さはそれ以上。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the poison accumulated in their bodies is even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをあの扱いとは、なかなか面白い身体だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And yet Chinu handles it like that, quite an interesting body indeed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言ってる場合か、こら！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this the time to talk?! Come on!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬちゃん、ぺっしなさい、ぺっ！」
「んー？　平気だよ。
蘇ってから、なんだか毒も平気になっちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I was revived, somehow I'm okay with poison now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ゾンビっぽいからかな……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maybe it's because she’s like a zombie...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ゾンビさんみたいだからでしょうか……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Could it be that she’s like a zombie...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも彼女は生きているのです」
「イチコロ茶葉に、混ぜて、混ぜて……うん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mix it into the Ichikoro tea leaves, stir, stir... yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスに戻る頃には、きっといい感じ☆」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time we return to Zeth, it should taste just right ☆"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬは嬉しそうに、ティーポットに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chinu happily dripped the poison into the teapot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毒を垂らし入れ、よく混ぜて閉めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stirred it well, and closed the lid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ね、ね、らんすたま。
完成したよ、ご褒美欲しいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s finished! I want a reward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゅーとか☆」
「ばっ、よせ！
その口で今、キスしようとするんじゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't try to kiss me with that mouth right now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えー。残念……☆」
ランス達は毒を採取して、ゼスへの帰路に就いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others collected the poison and set off on the road back to Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニカニカ平原――
――その、ゼス軍東方司令部。
「おーす、戻った…………うお！」
サイアスとウスピラは椅子の背にもたれかかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saiaasu and Uspira were slumped back in their chairs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐったりとしていた。
「あぁ、ボーヤか…………戻った、か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it’s the boy... They’re back, huh."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
